Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: West of the road is an ancient graveyard, part of Saint Anne's Retreat.
Room.LongDescription: Further west you can see the twin towers of the stone church and the bell tower near the front. The rear of the building appears to have a small garden behind it. Funny thing about graveyards, no matter how well kept they are, they always seem to be haunted. This one is not well kept.
